Instructions.text: Welcome to the fantastic world of flotation. Ready to start making some money with mining?

Great! Before doing that let's quickly go through the user interface (UI) of the game. Can you see the button labeled 'Lesson' on the center of the screen? Close this dialog box by pressing the 'X' button on the top, then open it again by clicking that button

Good job! Now press the button in the CONCENTRATE box to open the concentrate graphs. This is the stream that goes from the flotation to the bin. Check out the Cu grade's graph. What is the actual Cu Grade of that stream?
Alright! We have to make sure this value is 5% or more, which is the specification of our product. Anything below that will not count.
Now click on the circle of the flotation cell to open the controller. What happens to the variable “Cu recovery” if you change the air flow rate from 1 to 2 cm/s?
What happens to the variable “Cu grade” if you change the froth from -10 to -15?
Awesome. You are now officially introduced to the Flotation views. See you later!
